backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user, task, routine, payroll, and spending data models with access control and tier-based limits, plus supporting maps and type structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs associated with several admin dashboard–related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend React components and utilities.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Technical audit explaining latency issues in task completion toggles and recommending optimistic updates similar to routines.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, light/dark mode themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers for caching and offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component switching between Task Manager and Admin Dashboard views with theme and offline support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Empty placeholder file for an admin dashboard dialog component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin interface listing users with search, pagination, tier changes, and admin promotion/demotion actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Simple loading screen shown during authentication bootstrap initialization.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Floating bottom nav handling plan mode toggling, long‑press detection, and quick‑access actions for tasks, lists, settings, earnings, and insights.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: Dialog for creating a new list with a name input and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Empty placeholder file for a task‑creation dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Renders user-defined task lists with drag-and-drop, creation buttons, and list/task management actions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s fields such as title, description, list assignment, and flags, with form handling.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Displays tasks in the four Eisenhower quadrants with drag-and-drop, expansion, and optional switch to plan mode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright information and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top header with branding, date display, theme toggle, auth controls, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: Displays spend insights with charts, time‑period filtering, and balance status using tabs and recharts.
frontend/src/components/MonetarySettings: File is empty or missing content.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Manages morning/evening routine lists with creation, deletion, completion toggling, and drag‑and‑drop reordering.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows a full‑screen overlay when the browser goes offline using online/offline events.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Displays payroll history with edit and submit actions, supporting inline editing and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/PlanModeTipDialo: Shows a tip dialog explaining how to drag tasks between lists in plan mode.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides UI for modifying monetary settings, toggling earnings, and adjusting daily category limits.
Dialog for adding spends and managing spend presets, including confirmation flows and CRUD handlers.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Task card with drag-and-drop and touch-based reordering logic, plus edit and completion controls.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Simple button to toggle light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: Dialog that calculates and displays daily income from tasks and routines, and submits payroll.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: Login splash screen showing product features and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: Dialog for creating tasks in quadrant or custom lists with form state and validation.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoDialog.t: Dialog for viewing and editing user profile email with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Form component for creating a user profile with name and email, using validation and a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanModeTip.ts: Hook managing whether to show a plan mode tip, with per-user localStorage tracking and migration from a legacy key.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin actions, app mode, and various backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom utility animations for streak effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local React-friendly Task and List types with helpers to convert to and from backend types.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Maps user tiers to labels and provides a list of all tier values with labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks admin status and displays user management tools or an unauthorized screen.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main task manager page orchestrating authentication, queries, dialogs, routines, lists, and task operations.
frontend/src/utils/dailyPrioritiesEarnin: Computes daily priorities income based on quadrant task weights and scaling rules.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Provides helpers to write and read drag-and-drop payloads using custom and fallback MIME types.
frontend/src/utils/tierErrors.ts: Parses backend tier‑limit errors and maps them to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema version, high-level app summary, and a list of existing features covering authentication, actor creation, token handling, RBAC, user profiles, and tier system details. Serves as a central registry of implemented functionality for planning and reference.
